conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway rendering with defined wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D structure; walls show consistent height and thickness. Good isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is largely faithful but has errors: the 'Dining Room' area in the 2D plan has been labeled and converted into a 'Living Room' extension. The central 'Pantry' is labeled 'Stairs' despite the actual stairs being rendered adjacent.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen island and sink are correctly placed. Closet doors and bathroom fixtures are represented.

visual_clarity.notes: Rendering is very clean, but text labels printed directly on the floor and wall surfaces degrade the presentation score as per instructions.

detected_errors.description: Text labels (Playroom, Kantry, etc.) are embedded in the 3D model.
Central pantry identified incorrectly as stairs; Dining area geometry slightly simplified.

summary: A high-quality 3D isometric conversion that maintains most of the 2D plan's structural integrity despite some labeling and minor room identification errors.
